      • getEncrypter

        public OutputStream getEncrypter(Path path,
                                 BigInteger secret)
                          throws IOException
        Produce an encrypting OutputStream for the provided Path, using the secret if not null. If the secret is null, the SecretBean will provide the encrypting secret.
        Parameters:
        path - the Path to the file system
        secret - the secret to use for encryption, may be null
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getDecrypter

        public InputStream getDecrypter(Path path,
                                BigInteger secret)
                         throws IOException
        Produce a decrypting InputStream for the provided Path, using the secret if not null. If the secret is null, the SecretBean will provide the decrypting secret.
        Parameters:
        path - the Path to the file system
        secret - the secret to use for decryption, may be null
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException
